brand.title: Shiv Bhoomi Tour & Travels
brand.subtitle: Powered by the Spirit of the Himalayas

hero.title: Gadasaru Mahadev Trek
hero.location: Churah Valley, Chamba District, Himachal Pradesh

overview.text: The Gadasaru Mahadev Trek is a sacred and offbeat Himalayan journey hidden deep within the Churah Valley of Himachal Pradesh. This trail takes you through dense deodar forests, remote mountain villages, cascading streams, and untouched alpine landscapes before reaching the revered Gadasaru Mahadev Temple. Known for its spiritual energy and raw natural beauty, this trek is ideal for trekkers seeking solitude, cultural depth, and a strong connection with nature.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Chamba & Drive to Churah Valley
itinerary.description: Arrive at Chamba and begin a scenic drive towards the remote Churah Valley. Meet the trek team, attend a briefing, and prepare for the journey.

itinerary.title: Forest Trail to Base Camp
itinerary.description: Trek through pine and deodar forests, crossing streams and small villages before reaching base camp.

itinerary.title: Ascent Above the Tree Line
itinerary.description: Climb steadily into alpine terrain with panoramic valley views. Overnight stay at high camp.

itinerary.title: Gadasaru Mahadev Temple Visit
itinerary.description: Early start for the sacred temple visit. Spend time at the shrine and descend to base camp.

itinerary.title: Descent & Departure
itinerary.description: Descend through scenic trails and return to Chamba. Trip concludes.

inclusions.title: Accommodation
inclusions.description: Guesthouse and campsite stays on a sharing basis.

inclusions.title: Meals
inclusions.description: Nutritious vegetarian meals during the trek.

inclusions.title: Trek Support
inclusions.description: Experienced trek leader and local support staff.

inclusions.title: Safety & First Aid
inclusions.description: Basic medical kit and safety support.

faqs.question: Is this trek suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Fit beginners with prior hiking experience can attempt this trek.

footer.title: Shiv Bhoomi Tour & Travels
footer.description: Contact us to begin your journey into the untouched Himalayas.
